name: Light Up The Castle
description:
(In Development)

The castle has gone dark and it is your duty, as Candle, to light up all the chandeliers and avoid the domination of darkness. Explore rooms, discover hidden areas, and make sure that the night will be bright again.

Light Up The Castle is a third-person-shooter that focus on shooting at objects in the scenario to interact with the environment and the enemies. Wood burns for a while, candlesticks are a great safe spot, and chandeliers heal you.  You have to light these up to kill the enemies (shooting them only makes it confused for a short period of time). Collect the blue spirits (wisps) to gain ammo. You die without it. 

Once a number of objects are lighted, the room becomes bright, and you are free to go to the next room. (As of 06/01/2020, there are currently only 3 rooms, with a boss on the final room).
